description: This file defines several async functions for creating and managing entities such as users, organizations, teams, locations, and integrations in a backend API, interfacing with a Prisma ORM layer. It also exports these functions for use elsewhere.

methods.name: createUser({ email, name, password, role = 'MEMBER', orgId = null })
methods.description: Creates a new user with a hashed password, storing email, name, role, and organization ID.

methods.name: createOrganization({ name, ownerId })
methods.description: Creates a new organization with a specified name and owner ID.

methods.name: createTeam({ name, orgId })
methods.description: Creates a new team associated with a specific organization.

methods.name: addUserToTeam({ userId, teamId, role = 'EDITOR' })
methods.description: Adds a user to a team with an optional role defaulting to 'EDITOR'.

methods.name: createLocation({ name, address, orgId, teamId = null })
methods.description: Creates a new location associated with an organization and optionally a team.

methods.name: addIntegration({ locationId, type, providerId, accessToken })
methods.description: Creates an integration record linked to a location, provider, and access token.

ctags.name: addIntegration
ctags.pattern: /^async function addIntegration({ locationId, type, providerId, accessToken }) {$/

ctags.name: createLocation
ctags.pattern: /^async function createLocation({ name, address, orgId, teamId = null }) {$/

ctags.name: createUser
ctags.pattern: /^async function createUser({ email, name, password, role = 'MEMBER', orgId = null }) {$/
ctags.signature: ({ email, name, password, role = 'MEMBER', orgId = null })
